body:
I’m thankful for the woman who stopped us by the baggage carousel, having recognized us from the flight she was on, and told us that our bags were actually on another carousel.

I’m thankful to have started the day by smoking a joint on our 27th floor balcony as the sun rose.

I’m thankful that after a long walk, i had a bowl of tonkotsu ramen for lunch.

I’m thankful for the first bath i have taken since we moved, in a very deep and large bathtub.

I’m thankful to relax.
normalized_markdown:
I’m thankful for the woman who stopped us by the baggage carousel, having recognized us from the flight she was on, and told us that our bags were actually on another carousel.

I’m thankful to have started the day by smoking a joint on our 27th floor balcony as the sun rose.

I’m thankful that after a long walk, i had a bowl of tonkotsu ramen for lunch.

I’m thankful for the first bath i have taken since we moved, in a very deep and large bathtub.

I’m thankful to relax.
